courseDescription: Learn System Analysis and Design principles with this comprehensive eLearning course.

modules.moduleDescription: This module introduces the fundamental concepts of system analysis, its importance, and the system development life cycle.
This module explores essential techniques for gathering system requirements, including interviews, questionnaires, and prototyping.
Explore system design principles, architectural patterns, and interface design in this module.
This module focuses on the implementation and testing phases of the SDLC, including coding standards and testing strategies.
Understand system maintenance types, best practices, change, and configuration management.
